explanation: [0-0] In a hall decorated with white walls and wooden floors, a monkey wearing blue pants is examining a globe model in its hand, with rows of audience seats on the right. Japanese subtitles are displayed at the bottom of the screen.

[0-10] The monkey looks up to the right and points its finger in that direction as red Japanese subtitles appear on the screen. Then, it extends the hand holding the globe model, retracts it, turns its head to glance at the globe, and takes the globe away. The monkey stares at the globe as red Japanese subtitles appear in the center, then it opens its mouth and brings the model towards its mouth, starting to bite it. The camera pans to the right, showing the monkey biting the globe model, with chairs in the distance behind it. After biting for a while, the monkey takes the model out of its mouth, looks down at it, then holds it a little further away to observe. Japanese subtitles appear in the upper right corner of the screen, after which it puts the model back in its mouth and continues to bite.
